values: 欢呼；喝彩；鼓舞；振奋；安慰；支持；使振作；使高兴；为…加油；为…打气
欢呼声；喝彩声；快乐；高兴；振奋；乐观；欢乐（或幸福）的气氛；（拉拉队的）加油歌；加油诗

synonym.mean: 欢呼；愉快；心情；令人愉快的事

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 高兴地，兴高采烈地；快活地
欢呼者；用欢呼声激励者

word_group.brief_definition: 振作点, 振作起来, 打起精神
为...欢呼；为...助威；为...加油鼓劲
为某人大声叫好；为某人喝彩

bilingual.source: The children cheer when they see the fireworks.
bilingual.target: 孩子们看到烟花时欢呼起来。

bilingual.source: The fans cheer loudly for their favorite team.
bilingual.target: 球迷们为他们最喜欢的球队大声欢呼。

bilingual.source: The citizens cheer as Superboy flies overhead.
bilingual.target: 当超级男孩飞过头顶时，市民们欢呼起来。

bilingual.source: Let's cheer for our friend who is running the marathon.
bilingual.target: 让我们为正在跑马拉松的朋友欢呼。

bilingual.source: The crowd began to whoop and cheer during the concert.
bilingual.target: 演唱会期间，观众们开始欢呼和喝彩。

bilingual.source: The excitements of the concert made the audience cheer loudly.
bilingual.target: 音乐会的兴奋让观众们大声欢呼。

bilingual.source: During the festival, everyone joined in the banzai cheer.
bilingual.target: 在节日期间，每个人都加入了万岁的欢呼。

bilingual.source: The crowd began to cheer as the band took the stage.
bilingual.target: 当乐队登上舞台时，观众开始欢呼。

bilingual.source: The loudest cheer came when the team scored the winning goal.
bilingual.target: 当球队进了制胜球时，欢呼声是最响的。

bilingual.source: He was snaking his head on stage, causing the audience to cheer.
bilingual.target: 他在舞台上摆头，引起了观众的欢呼。

list.abstract: cheer（英 [tʃɪə]，美 [tʃɪr]），英语单词，作动词时，为欢呼；喝彩；呼叫鼓劲。作名词时，为呼叫鼓劲声；喝彩声；欢呼声。短语搭配有cheer up（振作点，振作起来，打起精神）。例句为“Things in life can cheer us up.（生活中的事情可以让我们振作起来。）” cheer及物动词类近义词有please、glad、satisfy，名词类近义词有sunshine、breast、applause等，不及物动词类近义词有hurray。反义词有uncheer、fulnessdishearten、complain，同根词有cheerful、cheery、cheering等。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, if you didn't cheer at my entrance, it's too late to buy into the premise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好意思，如果你没有为我的出场欢呼，那你现在提出你的假设也为时已晚了。

yingyinNormal.en: Here you go, maybe this will cheer you up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个或许能让你开心点。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, you know what might cheer you up? What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道怎样会比较开心？怎样？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, cheer up. You're gonna see her again, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 高兴一点，你们会再见面吧？

yingyinNormal.en: What am I here for? To cheer him up, I guess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我来是干什么的？应该是让他开心吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I took a walk in the rain to cheer myself up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去雨里散了步，鼓励下自己。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't have to come in here and cheer me up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不用进来安慰我。

yingyinNormal.en: What? What? He was trying to cheer me up. My pony was sick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他想要安慰我，我的小马生病了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, look, if l'm gonna cheer you up, you have to meet me halfway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想让你开心一点，你却总是中间打断我。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, maybe this'll cheer you up. I made your favorite oatmeal, plain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许这个能让你开心一点。我做了你最喜欢的燕麦片什么都没加。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what do you think? It's a charming illusion, but it does not cheer me up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得怎么样？很炫的视觉效果，但是我还是不高兴。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what do you want us to do? I don't know. You're scientists. cheer them up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你想要我们干什么？我不知道。你们才是科学家。哄他们开心。

yingyinNormal.en: Cheer them up? Do you even know what a scientist is? No, we don't need to be cheered up.
yingyinNormal.zh: "哄他们开心"？你到底知不知道科学家是干什么的？不，我们不需要人哄。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, waitress at a coffee house and cheer squad co-captain only took up so much room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，咖啡厅的服务生和啦啦队队长占不了多少空间。

yingyinNormal.en: Similar process to a secret cheer society I was in. Skull and Pom-Poms. I've said too much already.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟我曾加入的秘密拉拉队组织程序差不多。骷髅头和拉拉队绒球。我已经泄露太多了。

yingyinNormal.en: I put on a cheer-leading outfit to seduce Joshua. Then I lost him because I asked him to marry me after four dates.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我打扮得像个啦啦队长，倒追约书亚，约了四次会就叫他娶我，把他吓死了。

yingyinNormal.en: And my mom's in a funk. But maybe she'll come tomorrow. Well, Via's family will cheer you on. You'll be great tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我妈妈有些焦虑。所以她明天可能会来吧。没事的，维娅的家人会为你加油的。今晚你会表演的很好的。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, thanks for trying to cheer me up, but I'm not gonna date some random guy from your work. It's not random, it's Bob.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你 但我不要跟你的某个同事随便交往。不是随便，是鲍伯。

yingyinNormal.en: And on a different, but not unrelated topic, based on your current efforts to buoy my spirits, do you truly believe that you were ever fit to be a cheer leader?
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有一个不同的但并非完全无关的事情，就看你现在对我的鼓励方式，你难道真相信你能胜任给运动员加油的工作吗？

yingyinNormal.en: The watering can is for babies. Can we jump off the diving boards above now? Sorry, Peppa, diving boards are only for the grown-ups. Cheer up, you two. You can watch me dive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洒水壶是给小孩玩的，我们能从跳水板上跳下来吗？不行哦，佩奇，跳水版是给大人用的。你们俩开心点，来看我跳水吧。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 开心的；愉快的；乐观的；令人愉快的；令人振奋的

word_family.mean: v. 欢呼；喝彩；呼叫鼓劲；安慰；支持；为…喝彩；为…呼叫鼓劲；使高兴起来；变得高兴起来

sense_info_list.en: shout for joy or in praise or encouragement
make or become less miserable; instill with hope or courage
food and drink for a feast

word_usage.usage: cheer作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可接名词或者代词，如：The crowd cheered the runners.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 振作点；振作起来；打起精神

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 开心的；愉快的；乐观的；令人愉快的；令人振奋的

word_family.mean: v. 欢呼；喝彩；呼叫鼓劲；安慰；支持；为…喝彩；为…呼叫鼓劲；使高兴起来；变得高兴起来

sense_info_list.en: shout for joy or in praise or encouragement
make or become less miserable; instill with hope or courage
a loud shout of approval or encouragement

word_usage.usage:
cheer作“欢呼，喝彩”时是可数名词；作“振奋，欢欣”时是不可数名词。
loud cheers 高声欢呼
word of cheer 振奋人心的话
动词cheer表示“欢呼”；动词词组cheer up表示“振奋起来”。

examination_example.sentence: He walked across the stage as the audience <highlight>cheered</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在观众的欢呼声中走过舞台。

examination_example.sentence: "People are <highlight>cheering</highlight> and holding their carts in the air," says Giovanni Giorgio, who helped organize the march with a grass-roots organization called Generazione.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Giovanni Giorgio 说：“人们欢呼雀跃，将手推车举向空中。”他与一个名为 Generazione 的基层组织一起组织了游行。

sense_info_list.en: make or become less miserable; instill with hope or courage

cheer作“欢呼，喝彩”时是可数名词；作“振奋，欢欣”时是不可数名词。
loud cheers 高声欢呼
word of cheer 振奋人心的话
动词cheer表示“欢呼”；动词词组cheer up表示“振奋起来”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 开心的；愉快的；乐观的；令人愉快的；令人振奋的

word_family.mean: v. 欢呼；喝彩；呼叫鼓劲；安慰；支持；为…喝彩；为…呼叫鼓劲；使高兴起来；变得高兴起来

sense_info_list.en: shout for joy or in praise or encouragement

examination_example.sentence: All the football players on the playground <highlight>cheered</highlight> loudly, saying that I had a talent for football.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 操场上所有的足球运动员都大声欢呼，说我有踢足球的天赋。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 老脸皮的；目无尊长的；无礼的
adv. 开心地；愉快地；乐观地；乐意地；令人愉快地；令人高兴地；欣然地；自愿地
adj. 开心的；愉快的；乐观的；令人愉快的；令人振奋的

word_family.mean: v. 欢呼；喝彩；呼叫鼓劲；安慰；支持；为…喝彩；为…呼叫鼓劲；使高兴起来；变得高兴起来

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 振作点；振作起来；打起精神
为...欢呼；为...助威；为...加油鼓劲

sense_info_list.en: make or become less miserable; instill with hope or courage

examination_example.sentence: A good friend will <highlight>cheer</highlight> you up when you are having a bad day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你心情不好的时候，一个好朋友会让你振作起来。

examination_example.sentence: Liu decided to <highlight>cheer</highlight> up and have a wonderful life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 刘决定振作起来，好好生活。

examination_example.sentence: When he feels lonely and sad, he will play it to <highlight>cheer</highlight> himself up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他感到孤独和悲伤时，他会演奏它来让自己振作起来。

sense_info_list.en: shout for joy or in praise or encouragement

examination_example.sentence: The crowd began to <highlight>cheer</highlight> and Eddie heard his father's voice supporting him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人群开始欢呼，埃迪听到父亲在为他加油。

examination_example.sentence: The other riders sped past to the finish line, and Eddie heard a <highlight>cheer</highlight> go up for the winner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他骑手快速冲过终点线，埃迪听到了为获胜者欢呼的声音。

examination_example.sentence: Then, to his surprise, Eddie heard a sound and looked over at the crowd to see them <highlight>cheering</highlight> for him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，令埃迪惊讶的是，他听到了声音，他看向人群，看到他们为他欢呼。

word_usage.usage:
cheer作“欢呼，喝彩”时是可数名词；作“振奋，欢欣”时是不可数名词。
loud cheers 高声欢呼
word of cheer 振奋人心的话
动词cheer表示“欢呼”；动词词组cheer up表示“振奋起来”。
